import React from "react"; import { useState } from "react"; const AddItem = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: '', info: '', type: '', genres: '', creators: '', producers: '', country: '', year: 0, length: '', platforms: '' }); const handleInputChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setFormData((prevFormData) => ({ ...prevFormData, [name]: value })); } const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); console.log(formData); fetch('http://127.0.0.1:8000/add-item', { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' }, body: JSON.stringify(formData) }) .then((response) => response.json()) .then((data) => { alert('Se ha añadido el ítem'); window.location.href = '/item?id=' + data._id; }) .catch((error) => { alert(error); }); } return(

Añadir un ítem nuevo
